column1: #Text=Zuko says : " You sent this , did n't you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " You have more than one great - grandfather , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why are you telling me this ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Because understanding the struggle between your two great - grandfathers can help you better understand the battle within yourself .
#Text=Evil and good are always at war inside you , Zuko .
#Text=What happened generations ago can be resolved now , by you .
#Text=Because of your legacy , you alone can cleanse the sins of our family and the Fire Nation .
#Text=Born in you , along with all the strife , is the power to restore balance to the world .
